subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tyler Nading had 20 points and 8 rebounds as Washington University (29-2) won its second consecutive N.C.A.A. Division III men’s title, beating Richard Stockton, 61-52, in Salem, Va. Sean Wallis added 16 points and 10 assists for the Bears, who needed 27 years to get Coach Mark Edwards his first national title and only one year to get him another one. washington¶George Fox won its first N.C.A.A. Division III women’s championship, beating Washington, 60-53, behind Kristen Shielee’s 17 points in Holland, Mich., to finish the season at 32-0. Elise Kuenzi added 14 points for George Fox, which became the sixth unbeaten Division III national champion. fox (AP).
